PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-08712021-08-11,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  LAB,  TB
ActEmployment Equity Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Forces Employment Equity Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES EMPLOYMENT EQUITY REGULATIONS in order to (1) broaden the definition of CF members to include all members other than those declared non-effective strength; (2) repeal redundant provisions related to handling of classified information; (3) update schedules to ensure consistency with current occupational titles; (4) ensure that definitions of designated groups used in workplace questionnaires are consistent with the definitions in the Act; and (5) make other clarifying amendments.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0201 Publication Date: 2021-09-01
AttachmentsAttachment
